channel.title: Help with Megascape
channel.description:
Hi, I followed the tutorial, that was pinned, the only thing is im using MegaScape source... My error is that when I try to compile, and when I try to run the server it gives me there errors...
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/code]
Also I don't understand why it says "Starting TestScape on 0.0.0.0:43594," shouldn't that be where my IP address goes, where the 0's are? [br][size=1]Posted at: August 02, 2006, 09:30:28 PM[/size][hr]plz some1 help :( you can become admin if you help me make my server work[br][size=1]Posted at: August 02, 2006, 09:42:31 PM[/size][hr]BUMP PLZ HELP M3H

item.title: Help with Megascape
item.dc:creator: @Squida Squida
item.description:
@Squida wrote:

I have a diffrent problem with Megascape is the lag its hard to notice but its like when you start moving you go then the camra follows a little laggy though its hard to say but if you play it you can notice it so if anyone knows how to fix this then please tell me because i need to put it in

item.title: Help with Megascape
item.dc:creator: @pur3_d3ath pur3 d3ath
item.description:
@pur3_d3ath wrote:

ahh thank you i finally got it online, its offline now, because im adding stuff to it and testing, and i noticed your the maker of MEGAscape. I have another error, the game runs with it but the autosave doesnt work, on the log on the actual runserver.bat it says something about how it cant save, and when ppl log on the have 1 stats after getting them up…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Megascape
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

this is a problem alot of pple recieve, its probly cause u got a router, if so u need to get a hamachi network

to get hamachi download at hamachi.cc/download
then sign in, clikc the triangle at bottem right, click create, then choose a network name and pass, tell pple to join that hamachi network, then tell them ur hamachi ip (above your name in hamachi window), so then they can join with that ip, so just runserver while u got that hamachi network up, and walaa! pple can connect, if u want to connect to your own server use “localhost” as your ip.
u dont even need no-ip now

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Megascape
item.dc:creator: @pur3_d3ath pur3 d3ath
item.description:
@pur3_d3ath wrote:

no it doesnt say starting testscape on compile, just on run

I still cant log onto my server…[br][size=1]Posted at: August 02, 2006, 10:36:31 PM[/size][hr]EDIT: moparscape says that the server must be down…

I do have No-IP running(privatescape.no-ip.info)
I do have runserver.bat running
I do have moparscape running

so whats wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Megascape
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

0.0.0.0 = localhost = easyer way to put your own ip

and i dont see anything wrong
eccept that it shouldnt say Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 when u click on compile, it should say that when ever u start runserver.bat

Read full topic
